titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: The weather improved: & with a few rain showers was fine. In the morning I motored with Sir Charles into Paisley, & then to Barochan, & so home for lunch. After lunch we motored to Fairlie and had tea with Mr Parker.
